description.para: Each page may have an attached image.
The functions of this group manipulate that image.

briefdescription.para: Returns the image index for the given page.
Sets the image index for the given page.

detaileddescription.para: image is an index into the image list which was set with SetImageList().

description.para: Each page has a text string attached.
The functions of this group manipulate that text.

briefdescription.para: Returns the string for the given page.
Sets the text for the given page.

description.para: The functions of this group manipulate the selection.

briefdescription.para: Returns the currently selected page, or wxNOT_FOUND if none was selected.

detaileddescription.para: Note that this method may return either the previously or newly selected page when called from the EVT_BOOKCTRL_PAGE_CHANGED handler depending on the platform and so wxBookCtrlEvent::GetSelection should be used instead in this case.

briefdescription.para: Returns the currently selected page or NULL.
Sets the selection for the given page, returning the previous selection.

detaileddescription.para: Notice that the call to this function generates the page changing events, use the ChangeSelection() function if you don't want these events to be generated.

briefdescription.para: Cycles through the tabs.

detaileddescription.para: The call to this function generates the page changing events.

briefdescription.para: Changes the selection for the given page, returning the previous selection.

detaileddescription.para: This function behaves as SetSelection() but does not generate the page changing events.
See User Generated Events vs Programmatically Generated Events for more information.

description.para: Functions for adding/removing pages from this control.

memberdef.argsstring: (wxWindow *page, const wxString &text, bool select=false, int imageId=NO_IMAGE)
memberdef.name: AddPage

briefdescription.para: Adds a new page.

detaileddescription.para: The page must have the book control itself as the parent and must not have been added to this control previously.
The call to this function may generate the page changing events.

parameterdescription.para: Specifies the text for the new page.
Specifies whether the page should be selected.
Specifies the optional image index for the new page.

simplesect.para: Do not delete the page, it will be deleted by the book control.

briefdescription.para: Deletes all pages.
Deletes the specified page, and the associated window.

detaileddescription.para: The call to this function generates the page changing events.

memberdef.argsstring: (size_t index, wxWindow *page, const wxString &text, bool select=false, int imageId=NO_IMAGE)=0
memberdef.name: InsertPage

briefdescription.para: Inserts a new page at the specified position.

parameterdescription.para: Specifies the position for the new page.
Specifies the text for the new page.
Specifies whether the page should be selected.
Specifies the optional image index for the new page.

simplesect.para: Do not delete the page, it will be deleted by the book control.

briefdescription.para: Deletes the specified page, without deleting the associated window.
Returns the number of pages in the control.
Returns the window at the given page position.
Symbolic constant indicating that no image should be used.
Default ctor.

memberdef.argsstring: (wxWindow *parent, wxWindowID winid, const wxPoint &pos=wxDefaultPosition, const wxSize &size=wxDefaultSize, long style=0, const wxString &name=wxEmptyString)
memberdef.name: wxBookCtrlBase

briefdescription.para: Constructs the book control with the given parameters.

memberdef.argsstring: (wxWindow *parent, wxWindowID winid, const wxPoint &pos=wxDefaultPosition, const wxSize &size=wxDefaultSize, long style=0, const wxString &name=wxEmptyString)
memberdef.name: Create

briefdescription.para: Constructs the book control with the given parameters.
Sets the width and height of the pages.

simplesect.para: This method is currently not implemented for wxGTK.

briefdescription.para: Returns the index of the tab at the specified position or wxNOT_FOUND if none.

detaileddescription.para: If flags parameter is non-NULL, the position of the point inside the tab is returned as well.

parameterdescription.para: Specifies the point for the hit test.
Return more details about the point, see returned value is a combination of wxBK_HITTEST_NOWHERE, wxBK_HITTEST_ONICON, wxBK_HITTEST_ONLABEL, wxBK_HITTEST_ONITEM, wxBK_HITTEST_ONPAGE.

simplesect.para: Returns the zero-based tab index or wxNOT_FOUND if there is no tab at the specified position.

briefdescription.para: A book control is a convenient way of displaying multiple pages of information, displayed one page at a time.

detaileddescription.para: wxWidgets has five variants of this control:

wxChoicebook: controlled by a wxChoice
wxListbook: controlled by a wxListCtrl
wxNotebook: uses a row of tabs
wxTreebook: controlled by a wxTreeCtrl
wxToolbook: controlled by a wxToolBar
This abstract class is the parent of all these book controls, and provides their basic interface. This is a pure virtual class so you cannot allocate it directly.
